 
Chef want to meet her valentine. But she wants to play a trick on him. The meeting time is encoded in a long number N as chef is preparing for valentine's day he needs your help to figure out at what time his girlfriend is arriving in 24hr time system.
Your task is to calculate by adding all the digits of N until it comes under or equal to 24..
 

Input

The first line of the input contains an integer T denoting the number of test cases. The description of T test cases follow:

Each test case contains a single integer N denoting the coded time."

 

Output
Output description.

For each test case, output a single line containing containing the time in 24hr".

 

Constraints
Should contain all the constraints on the input data that you may have. Format it like:

1 ≤ T ≤ 10^5
1 ≤ N ≤ 10^18

 

Example
Input:
3
87234721
12312312
24

Output:
7
15
24
 

Explanation
Example case 1. here 8+7+2+3+4+7+2+1=34=>As it is greater than 24hr so 3+4=7
Problem Setter: Abhishek Pratap Singh
